If you can &#x27;t find your question, e: If you can 't find your question, email support@chatbase.co
Chatbase is an AI chatbot builder, it tr: Chatbase is an AI chatbot builder, it trains ChatGPT on your data and lets you add a chat widget to your website. Just upload a document or add a link to your website and get a chatbot that can answer any question about their content
What should my data look like?: What should my data look like?
Currently, you can upload one or multipl: Currently, you can upload one or multiple files (.pdf, .txt, .doc, .docx), paste text, or add a link to your website to be scraped
Can I give my chatbots instructions?: Can I give my chatbots instructions?
Yes, you can edit the base prompt and gi: Yes, you can edit the base prompt and give your chatbot a name, personality traits and instructions on how to answer questions ex. (only answer in French)
The content of the document is hosted on: The content of the document is hosted on secure GCP/AWS servers in us-east
Does it use GPT-3.5 or GPT-4?: Does it use GPT-3.5 or GPT-4?
By default your chatbot uses gpt-3.5-tur: By default your chatbot uses gpt-3.5-turbo (but you have the option to use gpt-4 on the Standard and Unlimited plans)
How can I add my chatbot to my website?: How can I add my chatbot to my website?
You can embed an iframe or add a chat bu: You can embed an iframe or add a chat bubble to the bottom right of your website. To do that, create a chatbot and click Embed on website. You  can also use the API to communicate with your chatbot anywhere!
Yes, Chatbase supports about 95 language: Yes, Chatbase supports about 95 languages. You can have your sources in any language and ask it questions in any language.
Can I share a chatbot I created?: Can I share a chatbot I created?
Yes, by default any chatbot you create i: Yes, by default any chatbot you create is private but you can change the setting to make it public and send it to anyone.
